3: Did my Corrupted... get stopped by the guards... Why aren't they here...
It won't be long... before the Punishing Virus is completely gone here..
Unless...
...You're finally—h-here!
W-why—i-is it you?!
I—got—you!
I can't fight a Construct like her... with the power from the Punishing Virus...
Roland the Ascendant, you better come with Nanami!
Nanami's going to take down your frame and your M.I.N.D.!
Hmm? You don't look... right.
(Chuckles) You do pick the right time to show up...
I've no strength left to deal with you... however...
If you want to catch me... you'll have to go through Nat's guards first...
Nanami's afraid of no guards! So stay there and behave, alright? Do—not—move!
Nanami immediately rushes toward the guards...
Maybe if I turn off the power input from the Punishing Virus...
In that case—I-I'll be an ordinary Construct...
But maybe it'll lessen the effect of the golden antigen on me.
Who could have thought that an Ascendant like me... would need to use the power of an ordinary frame...
(Looks up to find Nanami standing in front of him already) What... are you doing? The guards are behind you!
I don't like the sand... It gets everywhere...
You're... mad! Let me go...
(Uses Roland's body to block the vent on the ground) Ta-da! There won't have more of this sand coming through the vent now!
...A bit primitive, but I can't believe it works!
Nanami, can you locate more vents like this?! I can't see through all the antigens...
Blah blah blah, Roland's trying to talk his way out already!
Find the vents... block them... and I'll... I'll come with you...
Do you mean it?!
If you don't do it... Nat will take me... It's also bad for you...
Uh-huh, I see, I see...
